mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MATCHING M WHERE M.MT_NO = #{matchingNo} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM DUAL
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MATCHING M JOIN HEARTS H ON M.MT_HEARTSNO = H.H_NO WHERE M.MT_NO = 2 AND (H.H_SENDUSER = 1 OR H.H_RECEIVEUSER = 1) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS FROM DUAL

SELECT CR.CR_UUID AS cr_UUID, M.M_NAME AS cr_Name, M.M_UUID AS cr_OPPONENTUUID, CM.CM_MSG AS cr_Message, M.M_AGE AS cr_Age, MS.MS_STATUS AS cr_Status, CM.CM_DATE AS cr_Date, NVL(UNREAD.UNREAD_COUNT, 0) AS cr_UnreadCount, MP.MP_ATTACHONAME AS cr_AttachOname, MP.MP_ATTACHTYPE AS cr_AttachType, MP.MP_ATTACHDATA AS cr_AttachData FROM CHATROOM CR JOIN MATCHINGCHATROOMMAPPING MC ON CR.CR_NO = MC.MC_CHATROOMNO JOIN MATCHING MT ON MC.MC_MATCHINGNO = MT.MT_NO JOIN HEARTS H ON MT.MT_HEARTSNO = H.H_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.M_NO = CASE WHEN H.H_SENDUSER = #{memberNo} THEN H.H_RECEIVEUSER ELSE H.H_SENDUSER END -- ✅ MEMBERPICTURE 조인 LEFT JOIN MEMBERPICTURE MP ON MP.MP_MEMBERNO = M.M_NO -- ✅ MEMBERSTATUS 조인 LEFT JOIN MEMBERSTATUS MS ON MS.MS_NO = M.M_NO LEFT JOIN CHATMESSAGE CM ON CR.CR_LASTMESSAGENO = CM.CM_NO -- ✅ 안 읽은 메시지 수 집계 서브쿼리 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CM_CHATROOMNO, COUNT(*) AS UNREAD_COUNT FROM CHATMESSAGE WHERE CM_SENDUSER != #{memberNo} AND CM_READ_DATE IS NULL GROUP BY CM_CHATROOMNO ) UNREAD ON CR.CR_NO = UNREAD.CM_CHATROOMNO WHERE #{memberNo} IN (H.H_SENDUSER, H.H_RECEIVEUSER) ORDER BY CM.CM_DATE DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT CR.CR_UUID as cr_UUID FROM CHATROOM CR JOIN MATCHINGCHATROOMMAPPING MC ON CR.CR_NO = MC.MC_CHATROOMNO JOIN MATCHING MT ON MC.MC_MATCHINGNO = MT.MT_NO JOIN HEARTS H ON MT.MT_HEARTSNO = H.H_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.M_NO = CASE WHEN H.H_SENDUSER = #{memberNo} THEN H.H_RECEIVEUSER ELSE H.H_SENDUSER END LEFT JOIN CHATMESSAGE CM ON CR.CR_LASTMESSAGENO = CM.CM_NO WHERE #{memberNo} IN (H.H_SENDUSER, H.H_RECEIVEUSER) ORDER BY CM.CM_DATE DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CHATROOM CR JOIN MATCHINGCHATROOMMAPPING MC ON CR.CR_NO = MC.MC_CHATROOMNO JOIN MATCHING MT ON MC.MC_MATCHINGNO = MT.MT_NO JOIN HEARTS H ON MT.MT_HEARTSNO = H.H_NO WHERE CR.CR_UUID = #{roomUUID} AND #{memberNo} IN (H.H_SENDUSER, H.H_RECEIVEUSER) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_valid FROM dual
